title: Traffic Sign Detection System
description: Real-time detection of traffic signs using YOLOv8, MobileNet, and ResNet models deployed on a web interface with live video processing support.

title: Sentiment Analysis and Bias Detection
description: Developed ML/DL models for detecting sentiment and geopolitical bias in social media text. Supported academic research published in ICCiT 2024.

title: Monkeypox Outbreak Prediction
description: Built forecasting models to predict Monkeypox outbreak trends using LSTM, GRU, and ensemble ML models to improve predictive accuracy.

title: Attendance Management App
description: Cross-platform mobile app built with Flutter and Dart. Integrated Firebase for authentication and real-time database with Riverpod for efficient state management.

title: Full-Stack Web Development Projects
description: Designed responsive frontends with React, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Built backends with Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, and PHP (Laravel).
